attachments.title: An update on the Dash, the wireless heart-rate monitoring music headphones
attachments.text: Perhaps one of the most highly anticipated products out there is The Dash, by Bragi.Â  This tiny little set of &helip;
attachments.fallback: DC Rainmaker: An update on the Dash, the wireless heart-rate monitoring music headphones

text: Nice. So refreshing to see non-wrist wearables.
these actually seem like the real deal too. I remember the first time I saw their kickstarter I was sure it would end up being nothing but vaporware
Yurbuds (now owned by hk) was working on one, but my inside source says the project was killed
apparently the hardware is still too bulky to easily fit into an earbud?
yeah - which is what's so impressive to me about the Dash, it's HR monitoring, but also things like body temp, and still has room for on board media
i'm surprised they're wireless. there's a battery in there?!
I really like the idea that you can add "macros" to them.
some sort of thermoelectric energy harvesting might make sense here. probably 30 degrees between your ear temp and ambient
